name: S'moresUp
0:
”Alexa, ask S'mores Up for status”
”Alexa, ask S'mores Up how we are doing for the day”
”Alexa, ask S'mores Up whats the status”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: s'mores up
Developer Terms of Use
des:
S'moresUp simplifies household management by helping families stay organized, connected, and engaged.

This Alexa skill integrates with your S'moresUp Family Account and gives you status on how your family is performing for that day. It gives a summary of where your family stands with the assigned chores for the day, how far to go to complete the assigned chores, and also summarizes if there is approval from your side for chores and rewards.

Just integrate with your S'moresUp account and say "Alexa, ask S'mores Up for status"
